conversations.description: User uploads a 30‑page breach‑of‑contract complaint PDF; the AI extracts text, summarizes the key allegations, and suggests comparable settlements from similar New York cases.
Litigator provides a brief fact pattern for a personal‑injury accident in California; the system pulls jurisdiction statistics, computes a settlement range, and drafts a risk assessment.
In‑house counsel uploads an NDA‑protected settlement agreement; the AI summarizes the amount, confidentiality clauses, and release language for internal review.
Insurance adjuster enters details of a workers‑comp claim in Texas; the app fetches recent settlement averages, adjusts for inflation, and generates a negotiation briefing.
User asks for comparable discrimination settlements in the 8th Circuit; the AI runs a legal database search, extracts amounts, and creates a comparative table.
Corporate lawyer provides a redacted PDF of a prior settlement; the AI extracts text, summarizes key terms, and flags any non‑standard release provisions.
Attorney uploads a settlement agreement image; OCR extracts text, the AI produces a concise summary, and highlights payment schedule specifics.
User describes a product liability case in Florida; the system retrieves jurisdiction stats for similar claims, computes a median settlement, and advises on litigation strategy.
Legal analyst asks for the top five high‑value intellectual property settlements in California over the last three years; the AI searches, ranks, and presents a brief report.
Litigator wants to know the confidence interval for a medical malpractice settlement in Illinois; the app calculates low, median, high estimates with a 90% confidence level.
Insurance team uploads multiple settlement PDFs; the AI batch‑processes them, extracts amounts, and builds a dataset for internal benchmarking.
User requests a quick comparison of settlement trends before and after a recent statutory change in New York employment law.
Corporate counsel needs a summary of a confidentiality clause in a settlement to ensure compliance with GDPR; the AI highlights relevant language.
Attorney provides a short narrative of a construction defect dispute; the system fetches comparable cases, adjusts for regional cost differences, and proposes a settlement window.
User uploads a settlement agreement with a complex escrow schedule; the AI summarizes the schedule and alerts to any unusual timing provisions.
Legal researcher asks for the average settlement amount for breach of data privacy in the UK from 2021‑2023; the AI pulls jurisdiction stats and reports the figure.
In‑house counsel wants a risk rating for a pending class‑action lawsuit; the AI combines case facts, comparable outcomes, and jurisdictional data to produce a High/Medium/Low rating.
Attorney asks for a markdown report that combines case summary, top three comparables, statistical range, and negotiation recommendations for a client meeting.
User supplies a PDF of a settlement with multiple payment milestones; the AI extracts each milestone and creates a timeline visualization (textual description).
Litigator wants to know how inflation adjustments affect historic settlements from 2010‑2015 for a personal‑injury claim in Ohio.
Legal analyst asks for the median settlement for consumer fraud cases in California, filtered by claims exceeding $500,000.
User uploads a settlement agreement containing a non‑disparagement clause; the AI summarizes the clause and flags potential enforceability concerns.
Attorney wants a brief on settlement trends for maritime collisions in the 5th Circuit over the past five years.
Insurance adjuster requests a quick estimate of settlement range for a commercial property loss in Chicago, using recent comparable data.
Corporate counsel uploads a settlement agreement with a carve‑out for future claims; the AI highlights the carve‑out language and its implications.
User provides a short fact pattern for a wrongful termination claim in Washington; the system fetches jurisdiction statistics and suggests a negotiation ceiling.
Legal researcher asks for a list of settlements that included punitive damages in Texas for 2022‑2023.
Attorney needs a concise summary of a multi‑party settlement involving a joint venture dispute for a board presentation.
User uploads a settlement agreement scanned as a JPEG; OCR extracts the text, and the AI summarizes key financial terms.
In‑house counsel wants to compare settlement amounts before and after a recent amendment to the state's civil code.
Litigator asks for the confidence interval of settlement amounts for antitrust cases in the D.C. Circuit.
Insurance team uploads a set of settlement agreements from the past year; the AI builds a dashboard of average amounts by claim type.
User describes a product recall litigation; the system retrieves comparable settlement data and proposes a range adjusted for recall scale.
Attorney requests a risk assessment for proceeding to trial versus settlement, based on comparable outcomes in the same jurisdiction.
Legal analyst needs a markdown report summarizing a class‑action settlement, including total fund, per‑claim payment, and attorney fees.
Corporate counsel asks for a quick lookup of settlement trends for breach of fiduciary duty in Delaware.
User asks how a recent Supreme Court decision might shift settlement expectations for copyright infringement cases.
Litigator uploads a 50‑page settlement agreement; the AI extracts all release language and flags any ambiguous terms.
Insurance adjuster wants a summary of the payment schedule in a large-scale environmental damage settlement.
Attorney provides a brief of a medical device malfunction claim; the AI pulls similar settlements and suggests a median estimate.
User asks for an overview of settlement amounts for ransomware breach claims in the EU for 2020‑2023.
In‑house counsel needs to verify that a settlement’s confidentiality clause complies with recent state privacy laws.
Legal researcher requests the top three highest settlements for securities fraud in New York over the last two years.
Attorney asks for a concise risk rating and negotiation tips for a pending defamation lawsuit in California.
User uploads a multi‑jurisdiction settlement agreement; the AI separates clauses specific to each jurisdiction and summarizes them.
Insurance team wants a quick estimate of settlement range for a commercial auto accident in Florida using recent comparables.
Corporate counsel asks to see how settlement amounts have trended for data breach claims before and after GDPR enforcement.
Litigator provides a case fact sheet for a construction delay claim; the AI generates a report with comparable settlements and risk assessment.
User wants a summary of a settlement that includes an escrow account for future litigation costs, highlighting escrow conditions.
Attorney seeks an analysis of settlement language regarding future claims releases in a healthcare fraud case.
Legal analyst asks for an aggregate statistic on average settlement amounts for landlord‑tenant disputes in New York City.
In‑house counsel uploads a settlement agreement with a joint‑venture termination clause; the AI extracts and explains the clause.
User requests a markdown report combining case facts, top five comparables, statistical range, and actionable negotiation recommendations.
